verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My life is in You, Lord My strength is in You, Lord My hope is in You, Lord In You, itâ€™s in You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will praise You with all of my life I will praise You with all of my strength With all of my life With all of my strength All of my hope is in You.{/lang-eng}
